delegate(address).details: delegates all the governance powers to a specific user

params.delegatee: the user to which the powers will be delegated*

delegateByType(address,uint8).details: delegates the specific power to a delegatee

params.delegatee: the user which delegated power will change

getDelegateeByType(address,uint8).details: returns the delegatee of an user

returns._0: a tuple of addresses the VOTING and PROPOSITION delegatee*

getPowerCurrent(address,uint8).details: returns the current voting or proposition power of a user.

returns._0: the current voting or proposition power of a user*

getPowersCurrent(address).details: returns the current voting or proposition power of a user.

returns._0: the current voting and proposition power of a user*

metaDelegate(address,address,uint256,uin.details: implements the permit function as for https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/8a34d644aacf0f9f8f00815307fd7dd5da07655f/EIPS/eip-2612.md

params.deadline: the deadline timestamp, type(uint256).max for no deadline
params.delegatee: the user to who delegator delegates his voting and proposition governance power

metaDelegateByType(address,address,uint8.details: implements the permit function as for https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/8a34d644aacf0f9f8f00815307fd7dd5da07655f/EIPS/eip-2612.md

params.deadline: the deadline timestamp, type(uint256).max for no deadline
params.delegatee: the user to who owner delegates his governance power
params.delegationType: the type of governance power delegation (VOTING, PROPOSITION)
